snippet: The announcement is the first time Vodafone has confirmed the discussions after market speculation about a potential deal has circled the telecom companies for months.
abstract: British telecommunications firm Vodafone says it is in early-stage talks with Liberty Global over exchanging assets.
lead_paragraph: The announcement is the first time Vodafone has confirmed the discussions after market speculation about a potential deal has circled the telecom companies for months.

headline.main: Vodafone Confirms Talks on a Liberty Global Deal
headline.print_headline: Vodafone Confirms Talks on a Liberty Global Deal
